text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump @RepAdamSchiff head of the Intelligence Agency? Is coronavirus a Chinese lab produced virus created in a Lab as Chinese scientists alleged? Where are the missing Doctors that sounded the alarm? Those should be the kind of questions you should be answering. Do your job #COVID19
